title: Fix sidebar visibility in dashboard

requirements.text: Ensure the DashboardLayout sidebar is visible and properly rendered on the left side of the screen with Deep Onyx (#050505) background and Emerald (#10b981) accent colors

quotes: Where is the side panel bar

acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar appears on the left side of the dashboard
Navigation links (Command Center, Security Vault, Team, Pricing, Settings) are visible
User identity section displays the logged-in user's name
Logout button is visible and fixed at the bottom
Sidebar uses Deep Onyx background with Emerald accents for active states

requirements.text: Verify sidebar is not hidden by CSS display, visibility, opacity, z-index, or overflow properties in DashboardLayout component and parent containers
acceptanceCriteria: No parent container clips or hides the sidebar
Sidebar z-index allows it to appear above background elements
Sidebar width and positioning are correctly applied

requirements.text: Check responsive behavior to ensure sidebar is not collapsed or hidden on the current viewport size being used
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar displays correctly on desktop viewports (â‰¥1024px)
If viewport is mobile/tablet size, appropriate responsive behavior is applied
Media query breakpoints do not inadvertently hide the sidebar

constraints: Do not modify the overall architecture of DashboardLayout
Preserve existing navigation structure and user identity display
Maintain Deep Onyx (#050505) and Emerald (#10b981) color scheme
nonGoals: Changing the sidebar position from left to another location
Adding new navigation items or features to the sidebar
Modifying the backend or authentication logic
